user_query: I'm organizing a company team-building event and I want to include some fun activities. Can you provide me with a random chuck joke about teamwork and interesting trivia facts about the number 1729? Also, recommend some trivia questions from the Trivia by API-Ninjas API that I can use for a trivia contest at the event.

TaskList.description: Fetch a random chuck joke related to teamwork.
Retrieve interesting trivia facts about the number 1729.
Access the Trivia by API-Ninjas API to get a list of trivia questions suitable for a contest.
